001package edu.cnm.deepdive.spaceseek.model.dao;
002
003import androidx.lifecycle.LiveData;
004import androidx.room.Dao;
005import androidx.room.Insert;
006import androidx.room.OnConflictStrategy;
007import androidx.room.Query;
008import edu.cnm.deepdive.spaceseek.model.entity.Apod;
009import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Completable;
010import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Single;
011import java.time.LocalDate;
012import java.util.List;
013
014//@Dao annotation indicates that this interface will define methods for interacting with the database.
015@Dao
016public interface ApodDao {
017
018  // insert Method inserts a single Apod.
019// OnConflictStrategy will ignore insert operation/no data updated if trying to insert an Apod with same ID as existing one.
020// Returns Completable used to handle completion of the insert method.
021  @Insert(onConflict = OnConflictStrategy.IGNORE)
022  Completable insert(List<Apod> apods);
023
024  // insert Method to insert list of Apods
025  @Insert(onConflict = OnConflictStrategy.IGNORE)
026  Single<Long> insert(Apod apod);
027
028  default Single<Apod> insertAndReturn(Apod apod) {
029    return insert(apod)
030        .map((id) -> {
031          apod.setId(Math.abs(id));
032          return apod;
033        });
034  }
035
036  // deleteAll Method deletes all records from the apod table
037// Returns Completable to handle completion of delete method.
038  @Query("DELETE FROM apod")
039  Completable deleteAll();
040
041  // select(long id) method retrieves apod by its ID.
042// Returns LiveData objects: meaning data will be observed & updated automatically when db changes.
043  @Query("SELECT * FROM apod WHERE apod_id = :id")
044  LiveData<Apod> select(long id);
045
046  // Retrieves apod by its date. Returns LiveData object to observe & update.
047  @Query("SELECT * FROM apod WHERE date = :date")
048  LiveData<Apod> select(LocalDate date);
049
050  // Retrieves list of apods within a date range date. Returns LiveData object.
051  @Query("SELECT * FROM apod WHERE date >= :startDate AND date < :endDate ORDER BY date ASC")
052  LiveData<List<Apod>> selectRange(LocalDate startDate, LocalDate endDate);
053
054  // Retrieves list of Apods starting from given :startDate. Returns LiveData object.
055  @Query("SELECT * FROM apod WHERE date >= :startDate ORDER BY date ASC")
056  LiveData<List<Apod>> selectOpenRange(LocalDate startDate);
057
058  // Retrieves list of favorite apod entities.
059  @Query("SELECT * FROM apod WHERE is_favorite")
060  LiveData<List<Apod>> getFavorites();
061
062}
